ods:type.description: The FDO type of the object

hasAccessRestrictions.description: Indicates whether the collection has access restrictions.

filters.description: Filters selected for the collection (applicable to DVC)

filter_name.description: Name or identifier/UUID for the filter

filter_value.description: Value or configuration of the filter

isOrdered.description: Indicates whether the collection is ordered.

appendsToEnd.description: Indicates whether new items are appended to the end of the collection.

supportsRoles.description: Indicates whether the collection supports roles.

membershipIsMutable.description: Indicates whether membership in the collection is mutable.

propertiesAreMutable.description: Indicates whether properties of the collection are mutable.

restrictedToType.description: Indicates the type to which the collection is restricted.

maxLength.description: Determines the maximal length of the collection. (Type: integer, 0 means an empty collection, -1 means arbitrary length, Context: collection.)
